original_text: That is why I hope to send him to you soon. But first, I want to know what will happen to me here.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 내 일이 어떻게 될지를 보아서 곧 이 사람을 보내기를 바라고

sentences.original_text: I hope to send him to you soon
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 당신에게 곧 보내기를 바랍니다

sentences.original_text: what will happen to me here
